example_sentence_english: I want to close the window.
I was closing the door every evening.

translation_english: he was closing/she was closing/you (formal) were closing

example_sentence_english: We were closing earlier in winter.
You (plural) were closing the kitchen at nine.
They were closing the bar after dinner.
